quickStart.title: Create a topic
quickStart.description: Click the + button in the left sidebar to create a new research topic.

quickStart.title: Search for papers
quickStart.description: Click the search icon in the header to search arXiv. Use filters for author, category, or sort order.

quickStart.title: Add papers
quickStart.description: Select papers from search results and click Add. Papers download in the background with a 3-second rate limit delay.

quickStart.title: Ask questions
quickStart.description: Type a question in the chat area. The LLM will write code to explore your papers and iterate until it finds an answer.

quickStart.title: Inspect traces
quickStart.description: Click 'View trace' on any answer to see the step-by-step reasoning process.

faq.question: How do I add papers to multiple topics?
faq.answer: Use the search panel's topic picker when adding papers. Each paper can belong to multiple topics simultaneously.

faq.question: What does the context budget indicator mean?
faq.answer: It estimates how much of the model's context window is used by your documents and conversation history. Green (<50%), amber (<80%), red (>=80%). When red, consider clearing history or using fewer papers.

faq.question: Why do queries take so long?
faq.answer: Shesha uses Recursive Language Models: the LLM writes Python code to explore your documents, runs it in a Docker sandbox, examines the output, and repeats. This multi-step approach takes 1-3 minutes but produces more accurate results.

faq.question: Can I cancel a running query?
faq.answer: Yes. Press Escape while a query is running, or the query will be interrupted at the next iteration boundary.

faq.question: What is the citation check?
faq.answer: It verifies that claims in the LLM's answer are actually supported by the source documents. The report shows verified, unverified, and missing citations.

faq.question: How do I export my conversation?
faq.answer: Click the export button (download icon) in the header to download a Markdown transcript of the current topic's conversation.

faq.question: Why do papers take a while to download?
faq.answer: arXiv has rate limits. Shesha waits 3.1 seconds between downloads to avoid being blocked. LaTeX papers also need parsing which takes additional time.

faq.question: Can I change the LLM model?
faq.answer: Click the model name in the status bar at the bottom to change the model. Any model supported by LiteLLM can be used.
